ERROR_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid username or password. You need to use master, active, posting or memo key to login.
TOOLTIP_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY: This is a custom password you've set to unlock your account for usage. This is not your Hive private key. If you forgot your hivesigner password you can import your account again.
TOOLTIP_IMPORT_ENCRYPTION_KEY: This is a new custom password to encrypt your credentials. This is not your Hive private key.
